title: remove _secret_ keys from repository
body_html:
the Rails session secret and the devise secret are public, they have to be private to protect the session of a user.

https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/blob/master/config/initializers/secret_token.rb#L7
https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/blob/master/config/initializers/devise.rb#L9
